means: 易于穿上或脱下的衣服

sentence.Network_en: Slip-on shoes are easier to put on than lace-ups.
sentence.Network_cn: 一脚蹬比系带鞋容易穿。

sentence.Network_en: He had a nasty slip on the icy path.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在结冰的小路上滑了一大跤.

sentence.Network_en: One slip on this mountain and you will fall into the abyss.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这座山上一失足便会跌入万丈深渊.

entry.tran: 穿脱方便的;不系带子的
entry.def: Slip-on shoes have nothing fastening them.

means.word_mean: 1. an article of clothing (garment or shoe) that is easily slipped on or off
